name: 8998! Block Puzzle Game
description:
8999! Square Block Puzzle
In this super fun game, There are 8 square boards containing 9 smaller pieces.
Fill up and clear the squares to get high score!

HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the given blocks and put them into 1 of the 8 outer squares.
2. Remove a square by making it full!
3. With each 100 points you get one star. Collect the stars to unlock new themes.

FEATURES
- NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy block puzzle anytime, anywhere!
- FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
- NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy 8998! at your own pace!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals suitable for everyone
